author: Michael Hardy
title: In Xinjiang, Tourism Erodes the Last Traces of Uyghur Culture
description: In the far-western reaches of China, the Communist party has long tried to eliminate markers of the Muslim ethnic minority group's identity.
content: Like the rest of the country, Chinas far-western Xinjiang Province is slowly starting to open up after months of near-total lockdown meant to halt the spread of Covid-19. For the past six years, though, the Chinese government has focused on stopping the sprea… [+3629 chars]
